Basically, this is a most useful collection, containing:
Adobe Fonto Folio OpenType Edition (>2.200 OpenType fonts)
Agfa Monotype Font Folio Mac OS X (274 PostScript fonts/families)
Bitstream Typeface Library (274 PostScript fonts/families)
Comic Life Deluxe Fonts (43 TrueType fonts)
Emigre fonts (112 PostScript fonts/families)
Extreme URW fonts (24 PostScript fonts/families)
FontBureau fonts (72 PostScript fonts/families)
FontShop FF Fonts (>300 PostScript fonts/families)
LetterPerfect fonst 2.0 (31 PostScript fonts/families)
Letraset Fontek (228 PostScript fonts/families)
Linotype Font Collection 2.0 (274 PostScript fonts/families)
P22 fonts (46 PostScript fonts/families)
